name: Seeker Bot
description:
Seeker Bot is a traversal game where the objective is to reach the end of the level in the shortest time or without falling down. You have various options to get across. You can wall-run, grapple to various points and dash your way across.

Currently the game is in prototype state where new features are being implemented. As of now the game hosts a single level and a sandbox level for practice and exploration.

Controls:

Run / Wall Run:  LShift (while moving)

Jump:  Spacebar (Hold to jump higher). While on a wall you can press jump button to jump in opposite direction or hold and release to jump higher.

Dash: Left Click  (while holding any direction key in air). While in air, can dash only 2 times until the player grapples or lands on ground.

Grapple: Right Click (can grapple to points indicated by grapple icon)

Pause:  Escape
